channel.title: [Delta] 317 - Prayer tab disconnects you
channel.description: Hi there, as stated in the title, every time you click on the prayer tab, it completely disconnects you. I've tried looking up guides on how to solve this problem as well as other people that may have had the same issue, but have come up with nothing so far. If anyone could maybe just point me in the right direction on how to solve this, it would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: [Delta] 317 - Prayer tab disconnects you

item.description:
@Beemobmo71 wrote:

Ahh, sorry about that. New to the site. If any mod sees this please close it, I’ll take the advice on keeping my topic in server help. (Can’t delete my own topic)

Read full topic
